title: simple Resident Evil (v2)
original_prompt: Let's start a text adventure game where you tell a story and give me options (A, B, C, D) to drive the plot. The game is set in a biohazard crisis. The protagonist is Xiao Ming, and his health is 100. Whenever I make a wrong choice, 10 points are deducted, and when I make a correct choice, 5 points are added. The game ends when the health drops below 0. After each choice, you need to tell me how much health is remaining.
input1: In a city overrun by a mysterious virus, Xiao Ming wakes up in his apartment to find that the streets are deserted and the news is filled with reports of a biohazard outbreak. He must decide whether to stay inside and wait for help or venture out to find supplies. A) Stay inside and barricade the door. B) Go to the nearest grocery store. C) Call for help using his phone. D) Search for a neighbor who might have information.
input2: After receiving a warning about a deadly biohazard spreading through the air, Xiao Ming finds himself trapped in a subway station with limited options. He can hear the distant sounds of chaos above ground. He must choose his next move wisely. A) Try to find an emergency exit. B) Look for a first aid kit in the station. C) Wait for the train to arrive. D) Attempt to contact the authorities through the station's intercom.
